Eliminating certain restrictions for telehealth services allows Arkansans greater access to healthcare without traveling long distances. Our bill will keep these services in place even after the public health emergency expires.
https://t.co/JisxFcG701

More than 80,000 Americans died of drug overdoses last year. 

Yesterday I moved to list fentanyl analogues as illegal substances, but Senate Democrats blocked it. 

It’s time to help the American people, not drug cartels. https://t.co/mchlkAaZWA
President Biden’s remarks on China did not meet the moment. He missed an important opportunity to rally our nation against the greatest foreign threat to the United States.

President Biden promised higher taxes, crushing debt, and open borders.

His agenda is dead on arrival.

President Biden's open-border policies and promises of amnesty have caused illegal immigration to skyrocket. Hundreds of thousands are flooding across the border with no consequences, and it's only getting worse. This is a crisis of his own making.

President Biden didn’t mention the 11,000 jobs he destroyed by canceling the Keystone pipeline – including jobs in Arkansas. Those jobs weren’t fashionable enough for this administration.
https://t.co/bRSMRSDmlJ

If Democrats agree that China poses the largest threat to our nation, why are they trying to cut funding for our military and nuclear forces?

Instead of spending $6 trillion on liberal priorities, we should fully fund our military and make our deterrent against China credible. https://t.co/S8KL1ImRIN

Illicit fentanyl is made to addict and kill.

I'm calling on my colleagues to support my measure to permanently control this dangerous substance. https://t.co/PFkStAqnZi
As bad weather and flooding move across northwest and north central Arkansas, please be safe and listen to authorities. https://t.co/feIJKvHRwY
President Biden is rushing back to the failed Iran Nuclear Deal and turning a blind eye to Iran's terrorist activities. https://t.co/TPY0TCLvdh

President Biden’s tax plan would put family farms in an impossible position: pay the government millions or sell your livelihood. 

Many will have no choice but to sell, often to large companies or global investors.

This is terrible for rural America.

Aborted children are not science experiments. https://t.co/4Wl4zjingK

U.S. support isn’t the problem - the Biden administration’s refusal to enforce the law is the true “root cause” of this crisis. 

https://t.co/JuMZ4jfwdu

The Chinese Communist Party has forced the @WHO to ignore Taiwan for over year, despite Taiwan’s impressive response to the coronavirus.

Instead of bowing to pressure from Beijing, the @WHO should allow Taiwan to participate in the upcoming World Health Assembly. #TaiwanCanHelp

The vulnerable Americans these shelters serve will suffer the consequences.

Allowing China unfettered access to American research institutions is akin to granting Soviet scientists access to our critical laboratories during the Cold War. We shouldn’t allow China to exploit the openness of American research institutions any longer. https://t.co/wNLq5Mqic3

Law enforcement officers need our support as they confront an epidemic of crime across the country.

Instead, Democrats want to make it easier for criminals to sue police. https://t.co/LuRv0Ycf16

Joe Biden is desperately trying to surrender to the ayatollahs, but they won’t yet accept it. The clock is ticking toward inevitable, abject humiliation.

As Russia encircles Ukraine on land and at sea, Vladimir Putin must understand that military aggression will be met with severe consequences. And it’s Joe Biden’s job to make Putin understand that—immediately.

He is reliably unreliable and consistently wrong. https://t.co/7yuJOF0bk5

Iran is the world’s largest state sponsor of terror, and the Biden administration is offering to lift *terror* sanctions?

Unbelievable.

Products stained with the blood of slave labor will never be clean or green.

https://t.co/zCTbC2uzJI

President Biden wants to force religious hospitals and healthcare workers to perform transgender surgeries. 

Doctors shouldn’t be forced to perform these operations, which may contradict their religious beliefs or even their professional medical opinion.

https://t.co/d251A1TD2p

The Biden-Harris campaign promise of a longer, stronger Iran Nuclear Deal didn’t even last 100 days.

The Senate Republican Conference may consider today a proposal to repeal the current ban on earmarks. If so, I will vote against the proposal and to retain the ban.

If someone in the country illegally tries to get a gun, immigration officials and the local authorities need to know. Our bill ensures that illegal aliens who attempt to purchase firearms are reported to the proper authorities. 
https://t.co/3m5Po11coL

The 340B program allows Arkansas hospitals to stretch resources to provide care for those in underserved areas. Our bill will ensure rural hospitals can continue offering essential services and treatments to those most vulnerable.
https://t.co/erUS0g07Mw

Stacey Abrams described Georgia’s new voting law as “Jim Crow” at least 10 times before MLB moved the All-Star game.

She also wrote “boycotts work” and threatened the businesses which didn’t attack the new law.

She convinced the MLB to boycott Georgia. https://t.co/b8NdgZsMcY

Thank you to the Arkansans from the @ftsmithchamber who visited me in Washington today—my first in-person Washington meeting in more than a year. 

We talked about new investments in the River Valley and the potential for growth throughout the Fort Smith area. https://t.co/pgEinz2Ekk

I was pleased to introduce New Hampshire Secretary of State Bill Gardner during today’s Judiciary Committee hearing.

Free & fair elections shouldn’t be a partisan issue, & Sec. Gardner is well positioned to talk about how federalizing our state-based system would wreck havoc. https://t.co/2Qzl3pSfkV

22,000 fewer American opportunities. 

https://t.co/k8ef9j6AZp

The Biden administration ought to send a message to the Kremlin that any incursion into Ukraine will not be tolerated.
https://t.co/bnQI5QMEqz

Rich liberals like Maxine Waters and Al Sharpton are never the ones who feel the pain inflicted by the riots they instigate. Small business owners and city residents suffer.

We need peace and order—not pain and rioting.

No matter the verdict, there is no justification for mob violence. 

Any mob violence should be put down immediately.

https://t.co/Mv34VknbLm

The White House now says President Biden admitting the border situation is a crisis “doesn’t represent the administration’s official position.”

Who’s in charge?
https://t.co/ZswFe2ce6X

Keeping President Trump’s refugee cap is a promising sign that President Biden understands his open border policies have failed.

Now, Biden needs to fix the mess he created on the southern border.

https://t.co/y1D1Q7EWg3

If you take an American hostage – it won’t only be the hostage that will suffer. America must never accept extortion by hostage-taking as the cost of doing business. It warrants severe consequences, and that’s what this bill delivers.
https://t.co/jo14UBYUOn
Packing the court is an illegitimate attack on the founding principles of this country and the rule of law. https://t.co/L3xfnRd0tr

The Associate Attorney General of the United States must be able to effectively represent the United States in court—something that will be impossible for Vanita Gupta who has repeatedly accused dozens of federal judges of being “opposed to civil and human rights.” https://t.co/dSkIfUrGiY

Anyone who believes “equal justice for all” is code for racism is unfit to serve at the U.S. Department of Justice.

Vanita Gupta not only holds this belief, but believes every single American is racist. https://t.co/0oVb2fLQtg

There must be consequences when Democrats break the rules to suit their partisan agenda.

Until a legitimate vote is held on Ms. Gupta's nomination, I will refuse consent for the nomination of any U.S. Attorney from any state represented by a Democrat on the Judiciary Committee. https://t.co/rwsMMIx2A0

Inmates shouldn’t be able to commit crimes from inside their prison cells, but contraband cellphones allow them to do just that.

My bill will allow state and federal prisons to use cellphone jamming technology to stop them. https://t.co/UdgjSx6VVw

Military families sacrifice so much for our country, yet military spouses face hurdles when seeking employment. Our bill will ensure spouses with professional licenses have reciprocity across state lines so they can pursue their careers uninterrupted.
https://t.co/VNrxPN4SO4

China is using U.S. technology to design weapons that target American servicemembers in the Indo-Pacific. 

We're asking @SecRaimondo to restrict the sale of such software--the U.S. shouldn't sell Chinese communists the rope they'll use to hang us.

 https://t.co/p5KKBdyW9n

Kristen Clarke repeatedly advocated to defund the police.

She is unfit to serve at the Department of Justice. https://t.co/SGizvFmNaF
Court packing will be the end of the Supreme Court's legitimacy and the end of the rule of law in America. https://t.co/lqAOwYfoyG

There is no room for these ideas at the Department of Justice. 

https://t.co/j8ztWABfm7

It used to be Soviets who called the U.S. racist and flawed at the United Nations.

The ‘defund the police’ movement has real victims.

Right now, Americans living in poverty are facing the brunt of a rise in violent crime.

The answer? Support and empower the brave police officers who protect these communities and follow the law.
https://t.co/n8I1Ywjucy

The Department of Justice isn't a left-wing advocacy organization, but if Kristen Clarke is confirmed it would become one.

Police officers and Americans should be terrified of having a Department of Justice that jumps to conclusions without evidence. https://t.co/NfKrBjfgNl

This morning I joined @hughhewitt to talk about Colin Kahl's nomination to be undersecretary of defense for policy.

Dr. Kahl's temper and blatant disregard for security protocols leave him wholly unfit for the role.
https://t.co/TZ8MWQCyc7

Colin Kahl’s decision to share what appears to be sensitive information on Twitter is yet another concerning lapse of judgement.

The FBI should review his past statements and public comments for any additional sensitive information.
https://t.co/MoLIHOdsZK

The production of critical technology like semiconductors belongs on U.S. soil.

My colleagues and I are urging President Biden to support bringing that manufacturing home.
https://t.co/7RCHFMFyVb

Just asked the Arkansans who live in Bald Knob. https://t.co/X76JbyFaAk

What a shame.

Religious liberty is a fundamental right regardless of where it is practiced. A great win for the First Amendment here.

Whether it’s taking control of state elections, eliminating the filibuster, or packing the Supreme Court, Democrats want to use their slim majority to change our government forever.
